title: Understanding and applying the donor number of electrolytes in lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02989E, Review Article
Pan Zhou, Yong Xiang, Kai Liu
Donor number plays an essential role in deciding lithium salt solubility and the Li+ solvation structure, thus influencing the electrode interphase, reaction pathways and kinetics in lithium metal batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
